resources.string: To recommend better songs, we’d like to get to know you a bit first.
Which languages do you usually listen to music in?
Which genres do you listen to the most?
Tap in order or drag to put your favorites on top.
What do you pay the most attention to when listening to music?
The lyrics are very important to me
The melody and rhythm matter more
I just want something playing in the background
Thanks for your answers!\nWe’re now ready to suggest the best songs for your mood.
